course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Financial Technology for Business Professionals
course.description: This course provides students with an overview of the underlying information technologies used in the finance, banking, and insurance industries. The course covers the critical business, legal and technology issues and the related risks faced by corporate executives when analyzing, designing, launching and managing Financial Technology projects to drive business innovations.
course.exclusions: ISOM 5340, CSIT 5920
